description: Modularization and code quality improvement plan for mindmap.js and related helpers.

tasks.title: Extract all helper logic to separate modules
tasks.details: Move history, layouts, pan/zoom, palette, bulk ops, metadata, versioning, validation, templates, import/export, events, rendering, and reasoning integration into their own files if not already.

tasks.title: Ensure single source of truth for mindmap state
tasks.details: All state (mindMap, selectedNodeId, etc.) should be managed in one place and passed to helpers as needed.

tasks.title: Clean up main mindmap.js file
tasks.details: Main file should only wire together modules, contain no duplicate or misplaced logic, and be well documented.

tasks.title: Add documentation and type annotations
tasks.details: Add JSDoc/type annotations to all modules and main file for AI and human maintainability.
